products.title: Meadow Nightingale Blue Roller Blind
products.description: White on blue creates such a striking and classic contrast that helps to make this stylish window blind really pop. The meadow nightingale roller blind features a pollergen treated fabric with a gorgeous design of wild flowers. This window blind is a smart and decorative way to bring peaceful shading to any family space. Product id: db-rbx2021 fabric colour: nightingale blue material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes meadow nightingale blue roller blind in blue.

products.title: Meadow Dove Grey Roller Blind
products.description: Add a chic touch of decoration to your windows and complement a modern scheme with this print of flora in cool grey and white tones. The meadow dove roller blind will bring both comfort and classic style to your space thanks to the graceful motif displayed on pollergen treated fabric. Product id: db-rbx2019 fabric colour: dove grey material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes meadow dove grey roller blind in grey.

products.title: Meadow Flower Solar Redcurrant Pleated Skylight Blind
products.description: Meadow flower solar has a beautiful patterned fabric which really stand out, there are also different variations of fun colours. The flowers really make your home feel warm and comfortable. Featuring an aluminium coated back, this fabric reflects heat in summer and retains heat in summer. A perfect thermal fabric. Product id: db-pls0124 fabric colour: redcurrant material: 100% polyester headrail: white rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.
